review.reviewBody: The food is very good. Loved the pineapple fried rice and the curry was delicious. Only thing, the portions are small for the price.
Every dish we’ve ever tried is delicious, it’s impossible to go wrong

2 star overall. The laksa is up to standard, the portion is huge and the soup is delicious.  The Satay Ayam was just ok, the portion was adequate but the chicken didn't carry the unique flavour of the BBQ; the sauce that came with it was a disaster; it was a small box of yellow-coloured salty liquid.  The Pad see ew is the worst; it didn’t carry the flavour of stir-frying sweet soy sauce, but only full of peppery taste, it’s disappointing, and we didn’t finish it.
